infospect

Class InformationSpectrum

  • java.lang.Object
    • infospect.InformationSpectrum

  • public class InformationSpectrum
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InformationSpectrum(int[] source)
      Generate *toroidal* spectral analysis of information content for for the array passed at initialization (See README.txt at https://github.com/kdbanman/InfoSpect for explanation and examples).
      InformationSpectrum(int[] source, boolean contiguous)
      Generate *toroidal* spectral analysis of information content for for the passed array (See README.txt at for explanation and examples).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object o) 
      int getBlockSizeFrequency(int blockSize)
      Returns the frequency with which blocks of a given size were repeated within the initializing array (this corresponds to querying the Block Size / Repetition Count tables in the README.txt).
      int getMaxBlockSize()
      Returns the maximum size that a repeated block can be for the array with which the InformationSpectrum was initialized.
      int getMinBlockSize()
      Returns the minimum size that a repeated block can be for the array with which the InformationSpectrum was initialized.
      int[] getSourceArray()
      Returns a copy of the source array with which the InformationSpectrum was created.
      int hashCode() 
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a well-formatted table of the spectral analysis data.

        clone, finalize, getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • InformationSpectrum

        public InformationSpectrum(int[] source)
        Generate *toroidal* spectral analysis of information content for for the array passed at initialization (See README.txt at https://github.com/kdbanman/InfoSpect for explanation and examples). (Non-toroidal isn't useful to me right now, so it's not done.)
        Parameters:
        source - Array of integers of length > 2 for toroidal spectral analysis.

      • InformationSpectrum

        public InformationSpectrum(int[] source,
                   boolean contiguous)
        Generate *toroidal* spectral analysis of information content for for the passed array (See README.txt at for explanation and examples). (Non-toroidal isn't useful to me right now, so it's not done.)
        Parameters:
        source - Array of integers of length > 2 for toroidal spectral analysis.
        contiguous - Whether or not to perform the analysis for contiguous compressible blocks only.

    • Method Detail

      • getSourceArray

        public int[] getSourceArray()
        Returns a copy of the source array with which the InformationSpectrum was created.

      • getMaxBlockSize

        public int getMaxBlockSize()
        Returns the maximum size that a repeated block can be for the array with which the InformationSpectrum was initialized.

      • getMinBlockSize

        public int getMinBlockSize()
        Returns the minimum size that a repeated block can be for the array with which the InformationSpectrum was initialized.

      • getBlockSizeFrequency

        public int getBlockSizeFrequency(int blockSize)
        Returns the frequency with which blocks of a given size were repeated within the initializing array (this corresponds to querying the Block Size / Repetition Count tables in the README.txt). Valid block size parameters range from getMinBlockSize() to getMaxBlockSize(). Invalid queries return -1.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a well-formatted table of the spectral analysis data.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
